title: Capstone Design
description: Teams apply a systematic design process to real multidisciplinary problems. Problems selected from a broad spectrum of interest areas, including biomedical, ecological, environmental, mechanical, and thermal.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (ME 3180 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 4315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and COE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3345 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3017 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
